channel.title: Images help [SMF]
channel.description:
I have a SMF forums
I need to add images infront of a username like Admin = admin image how would i do this?
i have added the images to the CPanel justn eed to add infront of username thanks

item.title: Images help [SMF]
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“Kollidierende, post:3, topic:171466”]http://custom.simplemachines.org/mods/index.php?mod=709

It won’t show up in the online list.
But when people post and stuff it shows it in front of their name.[/quote]
That’s the one i used. Im guessing your gonna put runescape images in front of it. lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Images help [SMF]
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“zilchuary, post:1, topic:171466”]I have a SMF forums

I need to add images infront of a username
like
Admin = admin image
how would i do this?

i have added the images to the CPanel
justn eed to add infront of username
thanks[/quote]

you need to actually modify the php source code (Don’t think smf has the ability to put images in front of usernames)

Read full topic
